overview: From the opening credits, which feature fisting, watersports and heavy-duty dildo action, it's evident that these guys are ready for a sexual adventure par excellence. Wearing harnesses, leather chaps, cockrings and torn-up blue jeans, hung stud Alexandros, hot muscle stud Leo, and lean, buff Kasey make up the threesome that get things rolling on a set that consists of platforms of different heights.
title: Manplay Xtreme 1
